CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The best devices of PDTP-BT and PDTP - DTBT show PCE of 1.64% and 2.37% , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP - DTBT |

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "PDTP-BT" and "PDTP - DTBT". These are identified as they are likely names of materials being referred to in the context of the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |

| PDTP - DTBT |

The other terms in the paragraph, "PCE", "1.64%", "2.37%", and "devices" do not appear to be material names.

After reviewing the paragraph, only one property name was identified as a material property, which is "PCE" (Performance Criteria Evaluation). The other entities, "PDTP-BT" and "PDTP - DTBT", do not appear to be material properties, but rather names of devices or systems.

PV.content:

Paragraph: The best devices of PDTP-BT and PDTP - DTBT show PCE of 1.64% and 2.37% , respectively.

In the given paragraph, the "Property Value" entities are the performance metrics (PCE) of the devices PDTP-BT and PDTP - DTBT. The PCE values are 1.64% and 2.37%, respectively. If PCE is not a material property, then there are no valid entities in the paragraph.
